20101201000707.667|20101201000709.333|CCO|TO HAND OVER THEIR CELL 
20101201000709.333|20101201000711.000|CCO|PHONES.

20101201000712.111|20101201000713.222|CCO|INTO THE CLASS WAS TURNED 
20101201000713.222|20101201000714.333|CCO|AWAY BY THE TEACHER.
20101201000714.333|20101201000715.444|CCO|>> THE DOORS WERE CLOSED AND
